verses.roman:
samudra-snāna kari' kara cūḍā daraśana
tabe āji ihaṅ āsi' karibe bhojana

synonyms: samudra-snāna—bathing in the sea; kari'—finishing; kara—just do; cūḍā daraśana—observing the top of the temple; tabe—thereafter; āji—today; ihaṅ—here; āsi'—coming back; karibe bhojana—take your lunch.
translation: "Go to the sea and bathe and look at the top of the temple. After so doing, please come back here and take your lunch."
